channel.title: Help how i make npcs say if im offline or not
channel.description: i use ultimate pk source plz help

item.title: Help how i make npcs say if im offline or not
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

youll need to add it in the autospawn.cfg

like this

[code]
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

spawn = 2745 2375 5068 0 3104 5068 3104 5068 1 Jad[/code]

put the range as 0

Read full topic
item.source: Help how i make npcs say if im offline or not

item.title: Help how i make npcs say if im offline or not
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

search this in the npchandler.java

						if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time dela

you should see somthing like this

if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "GET YOUR HOLIDAY STUFF HERE! HO HO HO"; } }

looke below that and you should see

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("admin")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is OFFLINE"; } } }

change the

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000)

to the npc id you wish to have saying it and then change

							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("admin"))

and remove admin and change it to your name

then change the message saying whoms logged in like this for example

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("n0vamage")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner n0vamage is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner n0vamage is OFFLINE"; } } }

hope this helps

`n0va

Read full topic
